intro:
Full Stack Engineer, whatever that means. I build Django applications for nonprofits and hold crappy PHP sites together.

Blog: [ZeroButts](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LbzPZKBWKLT5b7Y8Dbj3cTgyEvNfshp9w/)

Sites:
- [Roku Remote](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DDW4BiGRriR898yBmLaqDUmsMiLgVLPh6/)

post.body: This is a neat thing. It'll be interesting to see it develop.

I built [Roku Remote](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DDW4BiGRriR898yBmLaqDUmsMiLgVLPh6/) a while ago as I was frustrated how bad the remote app was for my TV. I've since ported it to ZeroNet and now I'm giving it to all of you.
